title:
Whole Grain Vegan Spelt Cranberry Lemon Muffin
bakerrecipes.com
I made this ADD IMAGE muffins
The Add tag button has moved! Click the tag (label) icon above the recipe to open the Tag menu. OK
directions: -Start by pre-heating your oven to 350F/176C and placing your muffin cups inside muffin pan.
Combine the Whole grain spelt flour, salt and baking powder in a bowl.

-add the almond milk, coconut oil, apple sauce, lemon juice and zest and raw cane sugar. Mix until sugar has dissolved and add in the cranberries and mix for 30 seconds or until cranberries are evenly disbursed in the batter.
Using an ice cream scoop, scoop the batter into the muffin cups about 3/4 high.
-Place in oven and bake for 25 minutes or until a nice tan golden color. Once baked remove from muffin pan and cool.
ingredients: 1/2 cup coconut oil OR Organic GMO Free Canola Oil
